description: Games played — name, dates, rating, description, links, trailer. Link to streaming rota via rotaDay if desired.

games.name: Rocksmith
games.review: Guitar learning game I keep coming back to. Great for learning songs and techniques with real guitar; the session mode and arcade minigames are fun for stream.

games.name: Borderlands 3
games.description: Looter shooter with co-op and humour.
games.review: Borderlands 3 keeps the series' over-the-top style and gunplay. Great for co-op, tons of weapons and builds, and the humour lands if you're into that. Endgame can feel grindy but the journey is a blast.

games.name: Borderlands 4
games.description: Latest Borderlands with new worlds and mayhem.
games.review: Borderlands 4 doubles down on chaos and variety. New characters and planets keep it fresh; gunplay and co-op are as fun as ever. Solid pick if you loved the previous games.

games.name: It Takes Two
games.review: It Takes Two is one of the best co-op games out there. Clever level design, constant variety, and it really does need two players — perfect for stream with a friend. Heartwarming story and no dull moments.

games.name: Call of Duty
games.review: Call of Duty delivers solid gunplay and variety — campaign, multiplayer, and sometimes zombies. Great for short sessions and stream; the action stays high.

games.name: Portal 2
games.description: Puzzle FPS with portals and wit.
games.review: Portal 2 is a classic. The puzzles are clever, the writing is sharp, and co-op adds a whole extra campaign. Still holds up and always fun to revisit or show on stream.
